tool_description: An api that provides icons of cryptocurrencies
name: Crypto Icon
title: Crypto Icon

api_list.name: Get Icon
api_list.description: Get the icon of a cryptocurrency by passing the abbreviation of the cryptocurrency.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-icon.p.rapidapi.com/get-icon/btc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-icon.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-icon.p.rapidapi.com/get-icon/{icon}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-icon.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
